text: The 1997 Torneo Clausura was part of the 46th completed season of the Primera B de Chile. Everton was tournament’s champion after beating Rangers in the tie-breaker final. ==League table== ==References== ==External links== * RSSSF 1997 Category:Primera B de Chile seasons Primera B Chil
title: 1997 Torneo Apertura (Primera B de Chile)
